description:
the mark of the
        accusative, prefixed as a rule only to nouns that are definite

senses.description:
As mark of the accusative prefixed to substantives defined either by the article (or כֹּל
    ), or by a genitive or pronominal affix, or in virtue of being proper names
marks an accusative in other relations than that of direct object to a verb

Chiefly in an inferior or later style, אֵת (or וְאֵת) is used
    irregularly
